channel.title: Compiler
channel.description:
Who can help me my compiler doesn't work on servers what i have downloaded
can some 1 give me a good compiler i have the compiler of mod adam but doesnt work that says you need have jdk6.0 or 5.0 but i have already downloaded jdk6.0 but doesn't work and sometimes he said java is not an interne
can some 1 help me
Thank tou..
Ramon :)

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @lol_range01 lol range01
item.description:
@lol_range01 wrote:

i dont like mod adams compiler i do this

right klick on ur runserver.bat and edit delete everything in there and replase it with this

@ECHO OFF

REM ---------------------------------------------------
REM Made By Lamez, Please to not edit or copy any
REM thing without permission from Lamez (James Little)
REM Please Visit http://krazyscape.lamezz.com
REM ---------------------------------------------------
REM This will Compile and Run your server at option
REM ---------------------------------------------------

:start
color a
cls
TITLE Do You Want To Compile? - Made By Lamez
ECHO [Y]es or [N]o
ECHO.
SET/p do=Do You Want To Compile Before Run?:^>

if “%do%” equ “y” goto comp
if “%do%” equ “Y” goto comp
if “%do%” equ “n” goto server
if “%do%” equ “N” goto server
if “%do%” equ “” goto error

ECHO.

:error
color c
cls
ECHO.
title ERROR! - Made By Lamez
ECHO %do%, is not a command!
ECHO.
ECHO Please Enter: Y or N
ECHO.
ECHO Press Any Key To Continue!
PAUSE>NUL
GOTO start

:comp
cls
ECHO.
TITLE Compiler - Made By Lamez
color a
“%homedirve%\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“%homedirve%\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe” server

#.d echo e 100 07
#.d echo n 7
#.d echo rcx
#.d echo 1
#.d echo w
#.d echo q

debug < #.d > nul
copy 7 con > nul
del #.d
del 7
pause

:server
Title Running Server - Made By Lamez
cls
java -Xmx1024m -splash:splash.jpg -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server 4545
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Cyber_Punk Cyber Punk
item.description:
@Cyber_Punk wrote:

this happened to me… here is what i did. Right click compile.bat and the click edit. It should take you to a notepad. The notepad should look something like this:

@echo off
title BallerScape Compiler
C:\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac *.java > out.log

pause

change this part: C:\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\ to the path where jdk6 is located. Then compile and voila.

Read full topic
